column2: but Milo didnâ€™t say a word
column3: and to this day no one knows of the lost week but the few people who happened to be awake at 5:23 on that very strange morning.

column1: 0523|5:23|If I could count precisely to sixty between two passing orange minutes on her digital clock
column2: starting at 5:23 am and ending exactly as it melted into 5:24
column3: then when she woke she would love me and not say this had been a terrible mistake.
